_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Corruptions of the mind [sn27.7:1.7]: Desire and greed for intention regarding sights
Desire and greed for intention regarding sounds
Desire and greed for intention regarding smells
Desire and greed for intention regarding tastes
Desire and greed for intention regarding touches
Desire and greed for intention regarding thoughts
